mapper.sql: ID, ACCOUNT_SN, BALANCE, DELETED, CDATE, CREATOR, EDATE, EDITOR
mapper.insert: insert into T_USER_ACCOUNT(ACCOUNT_SN, BALANCE, DELETED, CDATE, CREATOR, EDATE, EDITOR) values(#{userAccount.accountSn}, #{userAccount.balance}, #{userAccount.deleted}, #{userAccount.cdate}, #{userAccount.creator}, #{userAccount.edate}, #{userAccount.editor})
mapper.select: select TUA.ID, TUA.ACCOUNT_SN, TUA.BALANCE, TUA.DELETED, TUA.CDATE, TUA.CREATOR, TUA.EDATE, TUA.EDITOR from T_USER_ACCOUNT TUA inner join T_USER TU on TUA.ID = TU.USER_ACCOUNT_ID where TU.ID = #{userId} and TUA.DELETED = 0;
